<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getblockFreq - Return block frequency. Return 0 if we don&#39;t have the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// information. Please note that initial frequency is equal to 1024 It means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that we should not rely on the value itself, but only on the comparison to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the other block frequencies. We do this to avoid using of floating points.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, to get the frequency of a block relative to the entry block,</span></CodeLine>
